citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45pm on
December 13th, 2021.
On arrival at the facility, inspector called the licensee and left a message. Rang doorbell and knocked on door several
times. Called twice more while waiting; inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45pm on 
December 13th, 2021. 
 
On arrival at the facility, inspector called the licensee and left a message. Rang doorbell and knocked on door several 
times. Called twice more while waiting; inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
